mapper.select: SELECT MTR_SUBJECT, MEM_EMAIL FROM MENTORING WHERE MTR_SEQ = #{mtr_seq}
select count(*) from MENTORING_QA where MTR_SEQ = #{mtr_seq}

select MTRQA_SEQ, MTRQA_CONTENT, MTRQA_RDATE, MEM_EMAIL, MTR_SEQ, MEM_NICK, MEM_PROFILE from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.MTRQA_SEQ, aa.MTRQA_CONTENT, aa.MTRQA_RDATE, aa.MEM_EMAIL, aa.MTR_SEQ, aa.MEM_NICK, aa.MEM_PROFILE from (select MTRQA_SEQ, MTRQA_CONTENT, MTRQA_RDATE, mq.MEM_EMAIL, MTR_SEQ, MEM_NICK, MEM_PROFILE from MENTORING_QA mq, MEMBER me where mq.MEM_EMAIL = me.MEM_EMAIL and MTR_SEQ = #{mtr_seq} order by MTRQA_SEQ desc) aa) where rnum > #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select MTRQARP_SEQ, MTRQARP_CONTENT, MTRQARP_RDATE, mqr.MEM_EMAIL, MTRQA_SEQ, MEM_NICK, MEM_PROFILE from MENTORING_QA_REPLY mqr, MEMBER me where mqr.MEM_EMAIL = me.MEM_EMAIL and MTRQA_SEQ = #{mtrqa_seq} order by MTRQA_SEQ desc
